ygData.subject: Re: The Neo Beast Wars RPG
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t believe I let this happen. Plintissa said. She was kneeling outside of the base, about 4 miles from it, holding a dismembered arm, mech fluid spilled

"I don't believe I let this happen." Plintissa said. She was kneeling
outside of the base, about 4 miles from it, holding a dismembered arm, mech
fluid spilled all over the ground. Dracona was standing over Plimtissa.
Dracona's hand reached out and settled on Plintissa's shoulder. Plintissa
cried, she had let someone else die all because she was working on the base
and never noticed Lightmare sneak out the back way. Plintissa paused. What
back way? Plintissa realized that there was something Dracona didn't tell
her about.

"Dracona, we have a back way out, don't we?" Plintissa asked.

"Yes." Dracona said. Plintissa sighed and took the piece of Lightmare, the
arm that wouldn't work. Plintissa put it into Cyberspace and walked back
towards the base, Dracona looked at the spilled mech fluid, collected some
of it into a little jar, and followed Plintissa.

Artist walked around the Poeple's Base, he was sick of waiting on Gangon! He
actually had to bring him a glass and it was too much! (A little frustrated
over one thing joke) Artist walked around until Dracona and Plintissa came
in. He followed them as the walked to a room that was previously locked.
Plintissa cried as she put the arm into cold storage. Artist opened a
cabinet and gasped. He slammed it closed he opened it again. There was a
hand, clutching a blaster there. Obviously, Plintissa and Dracona have been
keeping these pieces of corpses since they were on Cybertron. Plintissa
walked out Dracona looked around the room, looking for a spot to put some of
the mech fluid, she would check it out later, maybe see Lightmare's cause of
death. Artist opened another drawer. Artist's eyes flew open wide. There was
a arm. Suukie's arm. Artist slowly turned around and looked at the room. He
opened another drawer and seen Suukie's chest plate. Artist hunted around
the room, finding various parts of Suukie. Dracona walked out of the room.
Artist walked out and Dracona sealed the door. Artist slowly walked outside.
There was a scream and a bunch of blaster fire.

"Die Dinobot, die!" Artist screamed, shooting at something that wasn't even
there.

"Tavatron and Kluster must die too!" Artist screamed, holding his head in
pain. Dracona and Plintissa darted out the door to see what was going on.
Artist looked at them. He seen dracona. He stumbled back from an invisible
shot and stared at Dracona. Plintissa came close to Artist to try and calm
him down.

"Thief! Good grief!" artist yelled. He grabbed Plintissa and put his fingers
toward her mouth, and then jumped behind a rock. Plintissa sighed. Artist
laughed and grabbed someone invisible, slamming him into the base, or at
least that's what Artist thought. He grbabed Plintissa and threw her into
the base. Plintissa and Dracona stared in shock.

"Sinesis and Plintissa re impaled! Your next, Megatron! And then you,
Dinobot!" Artist screamed. artist started to struggle with a rock, thinking
it was Sinister and Sinesis. He was reliving different moments of Suukie's
life. Suddenly he was still, and just talking in rhymes. Like when he was in
the CR Chamber. Plintissa came close and decided she had to do what she had
to do. The revenge of Plintissa part of Suukie's life. Plintissa fired at
him, missing on purpose, and Artist thought he was blown to pieces. Artist
suddenly started to stare meanly, and walked toward the Maximal base.
Plintissa sighed and walked back inside the base.

"What happened to the bot I loved?" Plintissa whispered. dracona walked to
her lab.

Gangon had a dream, in his dream, BrightBlade was there, and she was
beckoning him to come closer. He came closer but then she ran from him.
Gangon stared in horror as Sinesis and Sinister, really huge, came above
him. Lightmare came up and kissed him, suddenly Dracona was chasing him, and
then he was tied to a chair, then he was bleeding, and then crippled, all
the time BrightBlade was laughing. Then suddenly, a form appeared, and
killed Lightmare and BrightBlade, but left Gangon to suffer. Deemos and
Inzola came out of the shadows. Gangon woke up, now he wanted to die more
than ever! That dream destroyed any hope he had left. He tried to call
BrightBlade, but couldn't reach his commlink. Plintissa walked into the
room.

"What kind of body do you want?" Plintissa asked.

"Where's Lightmare?" Gangon asked.

"Gone, something took her." Plintissa said. Gangon sighed at the thought of
it.

"What kind of body do you want?" Plintissa asked again.

"I want this one." gangon said. Plintissa seemed surprised.

"This is the body I've known BrightBlade with, I want to die with it."
Gangon said.

"Your not going to die, we're going to handle this." Plintissa said.

"I'm not switching bodies, and that's that." Gangon said. He highly believed
in what he was saying, he was crying.

"If that's what you want, I have no right to change it." Plintissa said.

"Can I get you anything?" Plintissa asked.

"A knife." Gangon answered. Plintissa shook her head.

"How about something to eat, then." Gangon asked. Plintissa nodded.

"Wait, sorry, changed my mind." Gangon suddenly said. Plintissa looked at
him.

"We'll have to fuel you up with energon then." She said. Gangon sighed, his
cheap way of dying didn't work. He suddenlt hoped that a giant rock would
fall on top of the base and kill him now...
